text: Sami Salo (born September 2, 1974) is a Finnish former professional ice hockey defenceman that played for the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League (NHL). He also played for the Vancouver Canucks and Ottawa Senators. He was selected by the Ottawa Senators with the 239th pick in the 1996 NHL Draft. Salo has also played 9 seasons with the Vancoucer Canucks, 4 seasons with the Ottawa Senators, 3 seasons with TPS of the SM-liiga, 1 season with Jokerit of the SM-liiga and 1 season with Frölunda HC of the Swedish Elite League. ==Other websites== *Sami Salo at nhl.com Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish ice hockey defencemen Category:Manitoba Moose players Category:Ottawa Senators players Category:Vancouver Canucks players Category:Tampa Bay Lightning players Category:Ice hockey people from Turku Category:International Hockey League (1945–2001) players Category:Swedish Hockey League players
title: Sami Salo
